TopicTitle: Top of the morning ta ye

Articles.Content: Hey, guess I\'m new, but I used to have an account before I forgot about this game, then it regained my attention with the new celestial bodies update, and with the promise of further celestial bodies, space stations and lunar bases etc. I\'m buying the whole game
Hey Ph4ntom S33ker, welcome to the community, the Alpha is definitely worth the low donation price and it\'ll only get better

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Definitely, and seeing as it\'s in dollars, I can probably afford more, maybe around $25. This game has SO much potential, and it\'s made better by the fact my awful laptop can run it
And thanks Captain Skunky, I remember you from when I was here last, you gave me some assistance with a downloading problem I had
